conversion_verification.notes: The model represents a true isometric 3D cutaway with clear vertical extrusions.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D transformation with consistent wall heights and clear interior volumes. Angle provides good visibility of all spaces.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Near-perfect layout fidelity. All rooms (4 bedrooms, living/dining, kitchen, utility, and toilets) are in the correct positions with accurate proportions.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture is simplified to geometric blocks but follows the 2D plan layout meticulously, including bed orientations and dining table placement.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity; easy to distinguish between structural elements. Lighting is soft but provides enough definition.

detected_errors.description: Window glass and specific door swinging details are abstracted into wall openings or solid blocks.

summary: A highly accurate and geometrically faithful 3D conversion that preserves the complex layout and furniture arrangement of the original plan.
